verses.verse: This <S%G5124><s%> is the third <S%G5154><s%> time I am coming <S%G2064><s%> to you. In the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of two <S%G1417><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> witnesses <S%G3144><s%> shall every <S%G3956><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> be established. <S%G2476><s%>

I told <S%G4280><s%> you before, <S%G4280><s%> and foretell <S%G4302><s%> you, as if <S%G1437><s%> I were present, <S%G3918><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> time; and being absent <S%G548><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> I write <S%G1125><s%> to them which heretofore <S%G4258><s%> have sinned, <S%G4258><s%> and to all <S%G3956><s%> other, <S%G3062><s%> that, if I come <S%G2064><s%> again, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3825><s%> I will not spare: <S%G5339><s%>

Since <S%G1893><s%> you seek <S%G2212><s%> a proof <S%G1382><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> in me, which <S%G3739><s%> to you-ward <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5209><s%> is not weak, <S%G770><s%> but is mighty <S%G1414><s%> in you.

For though <S%G1487><s%> he was crucified <S%G4717><s%> through <S%G1537><s%> weakness, <S%G769><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> he lives <S%G2198><s%> by the power <S%G1411><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%> For we also <S%G2532><s%> are weak <S%G770><s%> in him, but we shall live <S%G2198><s%> with him by the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> you.

Examine <S%G3985><s%> yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> whether <S%G1487><s%> you be in the faith; <S%G4102><s%> prove <S%G1381><s%> your <S%G1438><s%> own selves. <S%G1438><s%> Know <S%G1921><s%> you not your <S%G1438><s%> own selves, <S%G1438><s%> how that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is in you, except <S%G1509><s%> you be reprobates? <S%G96><s%>
But I trust <S%G1679><s%> that you shall know <S%G1097><s%> that we are not reprobates. <S%G96><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I pray <S%G2172><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> that you do <S%G4160><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3367><s%> evil; <S%G2556><s%> not that we should appear <S%G5316><s%> approved, <S%G1384><s%> but that you should do <S%G4160><s%> that which is honest, <S%G2570><s%> though we be as reprobates. <S%G96><s%>
For we can <S%G1410><s%> do nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5100><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the truth, <S%G225><s%> but for the truth. <S%G225><s%>

For we are glad, <S%G5463><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> we are weak, <S%G770><s%> and you are strong: <S%G1415><s%> and this <S%G5124><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we wish, <S%G2172><s%> even your <S%G5216><s%> perfection. <S%G2676><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I write <S%G1125><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things being absent, <S%G548><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> being present <S%G3918><s%> I should use <S%G5530><s%> sharpness, <S%G664><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the power <S%G1849><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> me to edification, <S%G3619><s%> and not to destruction. <S%G2506><s%>

Finally, <S%G3063><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> farewell. <S%G5463><s%> Be perfect, <S%G2675><s%> be of good comfort, <S%G3870><s%> be of one <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> mind, <S%G5426><s%> live <S%G1514><s%> in peace; <S%G1518><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of love <S%G26><s%> and peace <S%G1515><s%> shall be with you.
Greet <S%G782><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> with an holy <S%G40><s%> kiss. <S%G5370><s%>

The grace <S%G5485><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and the love <S%G26><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and the communion <S%G2842><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> be with you all. <S%G3956><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> The second epistle to the Corinthians was written from Philippi, a city of Macedonia, by Titus and Lucas.
